item.title: Suspected FBG Capital Address Transfers 16,524 ETH to Binance, Unrealized Gain of $7.98 Million
item.description: On August 19th, according to Chain.info, a particular whale/institution (with an Arkham Tag suspected to be FBG Capital) transferred 16,524 ETH (approximately $70.6 million) to Binance within the past 30 minutes. If sold, it could potentially make a profit of $7.98 million.

item.title: Three Whale Addresses Triggered Panic Selling of Over 34,400 ETH, Approximately $148 Million
item.description: On August 19th, based on the monitoring of LookOnChain, with the market plummeting, multiple whale addresses are in a state of panic and selling ETH.An hour ago, the address starting with 0x1D8d deposited 17,972 ETH into Coinbase (approximately $77.4 million);In the past 12 minutes, the address starting with 0x5A8E deposited 13,521 ETH into Binance (approximately $57.72 million);20 minutes ago, the address starting with 0x3684 deposited 3,003 ETH into Binance (approximately $12.89 million).

item.title: 「$125,000 Leveraged Long on ETH Liquidated」 - Whale Long on ETH Currently Facing Unrealized Loss of Over $3,350,000
item.description: On August 19th, according to on-chain data, the "whale with a $125,000 long position in ETH liquidation" is currently experiencing a loss of $2.675 million on a 15-times leveraged long ETH position and a loss of $678,000 on a 25-times leveraged long ETH position, with a total loss of $3.353 million.

item.title: SEC Chair: Will Participate in Project Crypt Furnace Fireside Chat at SALT Wyoming Blockchain Event
item.description: On August 19th, Paul Atkins, who is the Chairman of the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC), declared that he is going to take part in a fireside chat regarding Project Crypto at the SALT Wyoming Blockchain Seminar today.Note: SALT is a global investment platform that establishes a connection between institutional asset owners and asset managers as well as technology entrepreneurs.

item.title: The US stock market continues to decline, with the Nasdaq index falling by 1%.
item.description: On August 19th, based on market data, the US stock market continued to decline. The Nasdaq index dropped by 1.00%.

item.title: o1.exchange has completed a $4.2 million funding round, with Coinbase Ventures and AllianceDAO co-leading the investment.
item.description: On August 19th, as per official information, o1.exchange declared the successful completion of a $4.2 million financing round, with Coinbase Ventures and AllianceDAO taking the lead.According to the announcement, o1.exchange is constructing the first comprehensive trading terminal specifically designed for the Base chain. Additionally, it is launching a cashback incentive program with the aim of improving user trading experiences and platform liquidity.

item.title: Trump's son, through his holding company Thumzup, is seeking to acquire the mining firm Dogehash.
item.description: August 19th: As per The Block, Thumzup (Nasdaq: TZUP) is set to acquire Dogehash Technologies in an all-stock transaction. This acquisition seems to be one of Thumzup's initiatives towards a novel direction in cryptocurrency mining.Dogehash is an industrial-scale blockchain mining firm that concentrates on the Scrypt algorithm employed by Dogecoin and Litecoin. According to the terms of the agreement, Dogehash shareholders will exchange all their held shares for 30.7 million shares of Thumzup stock. The company will be rebranded as "Dogehash Technologies Holdings, Inc." and will be traded on Nasdaq under the new ticker symbol "XDOG." The deal is anticipated to be completed by the end of this year.Note: Donald Trump Jr., the son of former President Trump, disclosed in July 2025 that he had purchased 350,000 shares of Thumzup upon the recommendation of an investment advisor, with a value ranging approximately from $3.3 million to $4.3 million. item.title: LookOnChain: Bitcoin Drops Below $114,000
item.description: On August 19th, according to HTX market data, Bitcoin fell below $114,000 and is currently trading at $113,979, with a 24-hour decrease of 1.13%.

item.title: Ethereum Temporarily Falls Below $4200
item.description: On August 19th, according to HTX market data, Ethereum briefly dipped below $4,200 and is currently trading at $4,222, with a 24-hour decrease of 2.16%.

item.title: If Bitcoin drops below $113,000, the mainstream CEX's cumulative long liquidation strength will reach $1.292 billion
item.description: On August 19th, based on Coinglass data, if Bitcoin drops below $113,000, the cumulative intensity of long liquidation on mainstream CEXs will reach $1.292 billion.Conversely, if Bitcoin surges above $117,000, the cumulative intensity of short liquidation on mainstream CEXs will reach $868 million.**BlockBeats Note**: The liquidation chart does not disclose the exact number of contracts awaiting liquidation or the precise value of liquidated contracts. The bars on the liquidation chart actually represent the relative significance of each liquidation cluster in relation to neighboring clusters, that is, intensity.Therefore, the liquidation chart indicates to what extent the price of the underlying asset will be influenced when it reaches a specific level. A higher "liquidation bar" suggests that the price will undergo a more intense reaction due to a liquidity avalanche when it reaches that level.
